name: Maria
subtitle: Fallen Witch
description: The saint who blessed the hero that saved the world long ago. The cursed, outraged crow shoots sharp feathers at enemies and completely breaks the enemy's formation.
story: Although she was a Holy Maiden of Lua in the past, she eventually fell into corruption. Now, this cynical, crow-commanding witch curses her former Goddess from the darkness. There was a time when she was a friend of Kyle and a heroine of the people. However, when Kyle disappeared, she hid herself from the world as well. She eventually came back as a fallen witch, threatening mankind as the spearhead of the Demon Army. These days, however, she appears to be plotting some scheme, not as a Demon commander, but completely on her own.

recruit.greet: Don't greet the Dark Forces so casually, kid.
talk: Don't worry. I'm staying for just the night. My room is upstairs, mind coming up? Hahaha...
You're quite to my liking. In the sense that I want to rip you apart, of course...
Do you know what I'd really like to see? You, begging for your life on your knees.
recruit.gift: A quaint gift, befitting of a greenhorn such as you.

talk: You still seem kind of clueless. You've still got a long way to go until you can face them.
You don't know... So, you don't know what Lua really looks like. It's better if you don't.
affinity.gift: Ha ha... Alright. This will be good feed for the crows.

relationship.greet: ..Hmph, you came. I see, you are no longer a mere novice.
talk: When I look at you, I am reminded of him in his youth...hmm...
I hate Lua for what she did...but you, you are different.
You are an odd one, accepting a corrupted witch into your fold...how cute.

uw.story: A mysterious raven that can travel across dimensions. Its intelligence and shrewdness are certainly not those of a mere bird. In truth, it is a monster filled with dark energy, much like Demons. Indeed, it is said that this beast is as powerful as a high-ranking Demon. Some claim that it occasionally flies over fields of battle, speaking in human languages. Much of this creature's identity is still shrouded in mystery.

ut.story: Ashes of a grey messenger that announces the end. These are the ashes of the raven that flew into the Church of Lua right before the Republic of Gray collapsed a hundred years ago. Everyone ignored the ominous messenger, and only Priestess Maria cared for it until its last day. Even after its death, it has helped Maria expand her area of darkness by pouring its dark energy on her.
